Background

I'm currently a Part-Time Security Analyst at FS Investments, specifically performing a risk assessment of our current systems. I'm also a cybersecurity student at Drexel University where I've been able to gain knoweldge and hone in my technical skills!

I'm a 20 year old kid trying to make habits that will build my ideal future. I one day hope to retire my parents through my successes within the technology industry.

My goal is to innovate and change the way people live their lives, for the better. In my free time, I love working out, playing sports, reading, and spending time with friends.

Currently seeking any networking or small talk oportunities
